game.name: Painter Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PAINTER SIMULATOR는 플레이어의 상상력과 통찰력에 중점을 둔 차세대 게임입니다. 브러시로 보고 싶은 색으로 세상을 만들어 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PAINTER SIMULATOR is a new generation game in which the emphasis is placed on the player's imagination and perceptiveness. Create the world in the colors you want to see with a brush.
